desc1: The project was conceived as an innovative creation useful for the ecosystem and the environment: the professional monitoring of air pollutants and their propagation at different altitudes. After having found a skilled and willing team to get involved game, the 7 boys decided to enroll in the Robotics Olympics, to then start building a box with some sensors connected to an Arduino board, capable of transmitting data to this site.Everything is connected to a balloon filled with helium After passing a long period of testing, the team presented the project to the national finals (after having passed the preliminary selections). This work was chosen as a PCTO project thanks also to discussions with some teachers because it was able to develop numerous technological-practical skills. professional monitoring of air pollutants and their propagation at different altitudes.
